1.title: Mastermind I: CLI
1.description: A command line version of the classic Mastermind code breaking game using Node JS.

2.title: Mastermind II: GUI
2.description: Mastermind with an all new GUI using React.

3.title: Mastermind III: Evolved
3.description: Create an account, store your game history and compare your skills against our leaderboard. Game built using Node + React + GraphQL.

4.title: Mastermind IV: Mobile
4.description: Take Mastermind whereever you go on your Android or iPhone! Game builds on Evolved with React Native.

5.title: Mastermind V: Battlefield
5.description: Compete against your friends online in real-time and see if you are truly the best code-breaker.
